concept.title: Dataset Destinations
concept.shortdesc: Datasets can be exported to consuming applications and tools.

conbody.p: Datasets can be consumed by querying them through the PHEMI or by configuring a dataset export target as a "destination" in the .

Dataset destinations are configured by the . The destination is characterized in terms of the connection type, the network parameters, the destination database and schema names, and the user credentials for logging on to the destination.
